Create a string property definition

Source: R/input-schema.R
property_string.Rd

Create a string property definition

Usage

property_string(
  title,
  description,
  required = FALSE,
  enum = NULL,
  pattern = NULL,
  min_length = NULL,
  max_length = NULL,
  format = NULL
)

Arguments

title

Short title for the property

description

Longer description of the property

required

Whether the property is required

enum

Optional character vector of allowed values

pattern

Optional regex pattern the string must match

min_length

Optional minimum length

max_length

Optional maximum length

format

Optional format (e.g., "date-time", "email", "uri")

Value

A string property object

Examples

name_prop <- property_string(
  "User name",
  "The name of the user",
  required = TRUE,
  min_length = 2,
  max_length = 50
)
